DOC.brief_title: The BENEFICIAL Study : Evaluating Efficacy Safety Alagebrium ( ALT-711 ) Patients With Chronic Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , parallel design trial enrol 100 patient ( 2x50 ) stable CHF . Patients randomize either 200 mg Alagebrium twice daily placebo period 9 month . Efficacy measurement perform baseline , end study , include aerobic capacity ( VO2max ) exercise testing , echocardiography , Minnesota Living Heart Failure score , AGEs measurement blood skin , NYHA heart failure class , patient 's physician 's global assessment , level NT-pro-BNP . Safety visit perform 3 month interval . In addition , one safety visit perform 2 week randomization visit 1 month last treatment visit . A total 8 visit perform entire study .
